>
[Sociable Vow](/Feats.aspx?ID=3823) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Skill" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=144" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 166</row>

**Archetype** [Pactbinder](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=189)

**Prerequisites**
[Pactbinder Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3822)

</column>

---

You can leverage your vow in more social interactions. The circumstance bonus from your [Binding Vow](/Feats.aspx?ID=3822) also applies to attempts to [Gather Information](/Actions.aspx?ID=49), [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50), or [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) you make directly in service of fulfilling the vow.
